text: Whispering Smith Speaks is a 1935 American action film directed by David Howard and written by Daniel Jarrett, Don Swift, Rex Taylor and Gilbert Wright. The film stars George O'Brien, Irene Ware, Kenneth Thomson, Maude Allen, Spencer Charters and Victor Potel. The film was released on December 20, 1935, by 20th Century Fox. ==Plot== ==Cast== *George O'Brien as Gordon Harrington Jr. aka John 'Whispering' Smith *Irene Ware as Nan Roberts *Kenneth Thomson as J. Wesley Hunt *Maude Allen as Mrs. Roberts *Spencer Charters as Cal Stone *Victor Potel as Bill Prouty *Edward Keane as Rebstock *Frank Sheridan as Gordon Harrington Sr. *William V. Mong as Blake *Maurice Cass as C. Luddington Colfax ==References== ==External links== * Category:1935 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American action adventure films Category:1930s action adventure films Category:20th Century Fox films Category:Films directed by David Howard Category:American black-and-white films
title: Whispering Smith Speaks
